titleStmt.title: A progenie, of prodiges: or, treasons arraigned, convicted: and condemned, discovered. In the many successive practises: and succesles [sic] attempts of the Hamiltons to gaine the crowne of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Robert, fl. 1649.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the first yeare of King Charles, the second, 1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the Trinity College Library, Dublin
